title: Increased oxidative stress leading to decreased lung function

key_events.title: Oxidative stress
key_events.description: An imbalance between the production of reactive oxygen species and antioxidant defenses.

key_events.title: CFTR function
key_events.description: CFTR protein is a membrane-bound chloride channel

key_events.title: Airway surface liquid (ASL) height
key_events.description: The thickness of the liquid on the surface of the airway

key_events.title: Motile cilia number/length
key_events.description: Cilia in the airway that beat in a coordinated fashion to clear the airways

key_events.title: Ciliary beat frequency
key_events.description: The frequency at which cilia beat in a coordinated manner in the airway

key_events.title: Mucociliary clearance
key_events.description: The ability of the motile cilia to rhythmically beat to remove mucus from the airway

key_events.title: Lung function
key_events.description: Ability of lungs to perform normal respiratory functions.
